channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: I've made my own server using exion v1 source and ive portforwarded and i can play but when my friends try to connect it says error connecting to server any help? ive changed the ip in the files aswell

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Either portforwarded incorrectly or your IP is dynamic or i think you havent changed the IP in the client files correctly.

Read full topic
